thread.title: "Serious police incident" closes part of M6 TOLL | Central
thread.title_full: "Serious police incident" closes part of M6 TOLL | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: "Serious police incident" closes part of M6 TOLL | Central
text:
Drivers are being warned to avoid the M6 Toll in Staffordshire after what's being described as a "serious police incident".
Junctions T6 and T7 are closed in both directions.
Highways England @HighwaysWMIDS Follow #Staffordshire The #M6_Toll is closed in both directions, junctions T6 - T7, due to an accident. @ m6tollroad @ cmpg Helimed is on scene.
20:30 - 12 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite CMPG @CMPG Follow M6 Toll Northbound T6 to T7 closed. Serious police incident. @ cmpg_ciu in attendance. Please avoid the area if possible.
20:36 - 12 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Sat 12 Sep 2015 Travel Staffordshire West Midlands
